explains: adj. 癌的；生癌的；像癌的

sentences.en: The production of these cancerous cells suppresses the production of normal white blood cells.
sentences.cn: 这些癌细胞的产生抑制了正常白血球的生成。

sentences.en: The reproduction and growth of the cancerous cells can be suppressed by bombarding them with radiation.
sentences.cn: 癌细胞的繁殖和生长可通过放射线辐射加以抑制。

sentences.en: The conscience of the nation is appeased, while the population continues to puff its way to smoky, cancerous death.
sentences.cn: 国人的良知得到了安抚，而民众却继续在烟熏火燎、癌变中死去。
